sentence.Network_en: What set tongues wagging was the age difference between the two partners.
sentence.Network_cn: 这对伴侣年龄上的差异招来了不少闲话。

sentence.Network_en: It's rude to put out your tongues at people.
sentence.Network_cn: 对人吐舌头是不礼貌的.

sentence.Network_en: Great tongues of flame shot up here and there.

PerfectNetExp.abs: whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away ., 说方言之能 , 终必停止 , 知识也终必归于无有.
when the first snow came , as it did every winter , all six of us would run out into the yard and catch snowflakes on our tongues and in our mittens .每年冬天下第一场雪时，我们所有6个孩子都会跑到院子里，用舌头和我们的手套接着从天上落下的雪花。
are violent ; her people are liars and their tongues speak deceitfully .城里的富户满行强暴，其中的居民也说谎言，口中的舌头是诡诈的。
...语言听懂福音而显现的圣灵的恩赐。圣经记录说，生活在国外、为守节而聚集在耶路撒冷的人们，他们用自己的“乡谈（tongues）”听到没有多大学问的门徒们的讲道，都大感惊讶。门徒“按着圣灵所赐的口才说起别国的话（tongues）.

list.abs: 英文潮起来~~_English Corner_派派小说 ... 热裤： tight pants 舌钉： tongue pin 纳米技术： nanotechnology.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... tongue n 舌头；语言；口语 △ mother tongue 母语 equal adj 相等的；胜任的.
诊断学词汇 - 医学英语大家论坛 ... stool with occult blood 隐血便 strawberry tongue 草莓舌 stupor 昏睡.
绕口令(Tongue Twister)是一种语言游戏.学说英语绕口令, 无论从练习口齿的伶俐性还是了解英语语言的特点来说,都是一个极好的素材.

entry.def: Your tongue is the soft movable part inside your mouth which you use for tasting, eating, and speaking.

example.ex: I walked over to the mirror and stuck my tongue out...
example.tran: 我走到镜子前面伸出舌头。

example.ex: She ran her tongue around her lips.

entry.def: You can use tongue to refer to the kind of things that a person says.

example.tran: 她敏捷的才思和伶俐的口齿

example.ex: She had a nasty tongue, but I liked her.
example.tran: 她言辞尖刻，但我喜欢她。

example.ex: The French feel passionately about their native tongue.
example.tran: 法国人对他们的母语非常热爱。

entry.tran: (烹制后通常作为冷盘的)牛舌，羊舌
entry.def: Tongue is the cooked tongue of an ox or sheep. It is usually eaten cold.
The tongue of a shoe or boot is the piece of leather which is underneath the laces.

entry.tran: 舌状物;火舌;伸入水中的狭长陆地
entry.def: A tongue of something such as fire or land is a long thin piece of it.

example.ex: A yellow tongue of flame shot upwards.
example.tran: 一条黄色的火舌直冲上天。
一条冻结了的银色水舌

entry.def: A tongue-in-cheek remark or attitude is not serious, although it may seem to be.

example.tran: 漫不经心、虚情假意的态度

example.ex: This is all slightly tongue-in-cheek, I'd like to make that clear…
example.tran: 这一切都有些缺少诚意，我想清楚地指出这点。

entry.def: If you hold your tongue, you do not say anything even though you might want to or be expected to, because it is the wrong time to say it.

example.ex: Douglas held his tongue, preferring not to speak out on a politically sensitive issue.
example.tran: 道格拉斯沉默不语，不愿谈论政治敏感问题。

entry.tran: 正确发出(难读单词或短语)的音
entry.def: If you say that you can not get your tongue round or around a particular word or phrase, you mean that you find it very difficult to pronounce.
If you describe something you said as a slip of the tongue, you mean that you said it by mistake.

example.ex: At one stage he referred to Anna as John's fiancée, but later said that was a slip of the tongue.
example.tran: 曾有那么一段时间他把安娜称作约翰的未婚妻，但后来又说那是口误。

auth_sentence.content: Is it the written equivalent to speaking in tongues?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is it the written equivalent to speaking in tongues?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is it the written equivalent to speaking in tongues?

auth_sentence.content: He was appointed Secretary for Foreign Tongues soon afterward.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was appointed Secretary for Foreign Tongues soon afterward.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was appointed Secretary for Foreign Tongues soon afterward.

auth_sentence.content: Slice the tongues in half down the middle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Slice the tongues in half down the middle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Slice the tongues in half down the middle.
